insert into t_discipline_illegal2_tf (ID, BUS_PCODE, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_CODE, CREATE_TIME, ST_OR_ILL, ILL_ID, FACT_DESC, FACT_VALUE, OPINION, OPINION_VALUE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busPcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{standardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stOrIll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{illId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{factDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{factValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{opinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{opinionValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_discipline_illegal2_tf set DIS_ID = #{disId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUS_PCODE = #{busPcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_ID = #{standardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD_CODE = #{standardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ST_OR_ILL = #{stOrIll,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ILL_ID = #{illId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FACT_DESC = #{factDesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, FACT_VALUE = #{factValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, OPINION = #{opinion,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, OPINION_VALUE = #{opinionValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, DIS_ID, BUS_PCODE, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_CODE, CREATE_TIME, ST_OR_ILL, ILL_ID, FACT_DESC, FACT_VALUE, OPINION, OPINION_VALUE from t_discipline_illegal2_tf where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, DIS_ID, BUS_PCODE, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_CODE, CREATE_TIME, ST_OR_ILL, ILL_ID, FACT_DESC, FACT_VALUE, OPINION, OPINION_VALUE from t_discipline_illegal2_tf

select ID, DIS_ID, BUS_PCODE, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_CODE, CREATE_TIME, ST_OR_ILL, ILL_ID, FACT_DESC, FACT_VALUE, OPINION, OPINION_VALUE from t_discipline_illegal2_tf where STANDARD_ID = #{lawId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
limit 10

select ID, DIS_ID, BUS_PCODE, STANDARD_ID, STANDARD_CODE, CREATE_TIME, ST_OR_ILL, ILL_ID, FACT_DESC, FACT_VALUE, OPINION, OPINION_VALUE from t_discipline_illegal2_tf where DIS_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
